WorkItem.Description:
From discussion:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=35045
 
I've got the same bug while reading excel5 fle - it can't recognize autofigures, created by excel with error:
 
Fatal error: Call to undefined method PHPExcel_Shared_Escher_DgContainer_SpgrContainer::setSpgrContainer() in Q:\home\test1.ru\www\reader\Classes\PHPExcel\Reader\Excel5\Escher.php on line 473
 
The same error is for groups of images, even if they're jpegs, not autofigures.
 
To reproduce: just create excel5 file, insert two jpgs there, and group them.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 reader fails with fatal error when reading group shapes

Comments.Message: As of writing, PHPExcel does not support group shapes. The purpose of this work item is to eliminate the fatal error, and make sure that group shapes are silently skipped.
